name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience, I excel in leveraging **Python**, **TypeScript**, and database technologies such as **Postgres** to build robust, high-performance applications. My proficiency extends to developing scalable **APIs** and implementing **infrastructure as code** solutions using **CloudFormation** in **AWS**. I have a solid understanding of **relational databases**, **Data Warehousing**, and **Data Lakes**, enabling me to design and manage complex data solutions relevant to the healthcare and financial sectors. 
In addition to my technical skills, I bring expertise in functional programming and IoT applications, while also possessing hands-on experience in full-stack development using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My background includes leading projects focused on integrating AI/ML capabilities, developing machine learning pipelines, and ensuring compliance with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. I am committed to delivering secure, compliant, and scalable solutions that drive operational efficiency.

Collaborated with multidisciplinary teams to integrate IoT capabilities into applications, enabling real-time data collection and processing, which improved decision-making for user health insights.
Conducted rigorous testing strategies with frameworks such as **Jest** and **Cypress**, ensuring high code quality and reliability across **100%** of front-end features and back-end services.
Delivered intuitive financial data visualizations using libraries like **D3.js** and **Chart.js**, resulting in enhanced analytics tools that improved operational insights by **25%**.

- Played a key role in architecting data solutions using **Data Warehousing** and **Data Lakes**, processing over **2TB** of financial data monthly to enhance reporting capabilities.
